document_data.name: Night Orchid
document_data.mainbody:
'''Night orchid''' was a species of the [[orchid]] family of flowering plants with deep dark blue and purple flowers, leaves, and stems.

{{quote|''Oh hells, you didn't pick that by hand, did you? They're deadly poisonous! Joking. They are safe and beautiful. Thank you.''|[[Shadowheart]]}}
document_data.Habitats: Night orchids were rare plants that could survive areas afflicted with [[shadow magic]]. One such location were the [[Shadow-cursed Lands]] around the [[Moonrise Towers]] of the [[Western Heartlands]] in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Usages:
[[File:Night Orchid.png|thumb|''A flowering night orchid.''|230x230px]]
Night orchids were valued for their alchemical properties. The plants could be used to extract a solution of night orchid out of them â€“ a liquid solution of the color of evening. That solution, in turn, could be combined with certain types of alchemical vitriols to create ''[[superior elixirs of arcane cultivation]]''.

Others simply valued night orchids for their beauty. One such individual was [[Shadowheart]], a [[cleric]] of [[Shar]] from the late 15{{th}} century DR.
